channel.title: Regulatory Compliance on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Regulatory Compliance on FinanClub

item.title: WFC
item.description: score:1097 Chances: Wells Fargo’s CEO expresses confidence despite the second downgrade of the US credit rating, indicating potential resilience in the face of credit challenges. Wells Fargo’s support for nonprofit organization Concordance’s national expansion to promote financial health and stability reflects the company’s commitment to community development and positive social impact.

item.title: BKI
item.description: score:1173 Chances: Black Knight’s Data & Analytics division releases August 2023 Mortgage Monitor Report highlighting the heating housing market and rising home prices. The U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) dismisses federal court case against Intercontinental Exchange’s proposed acquisition of Black Knight, clearing the regulatory path for the deal.

item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:1058 Chances: Itaú Unibanco releases revised projections for 2023, complying with regulatory requirements. Positive growth in commissions, fees, insurance operations, and acquisitions supporting financials. Approval of interest on capital payment to stockholders by Itaú Unibanco’s Board of Directors. Potential divestment of operations in Argentina through preliminary negotiations with Banco Macro.
